coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH1Bibliosoph-Hint: With Bibliosoph, you  can send messages, roll special tables, and generate encounters, all through the simple push of a macro button. Forget the hassle of complex operations, Bibliosoph delivers all results and communication in engaging, thematic cards. This module not only simplifies in-game processes, but also enhances your overall storytelling, bringing your world to life in a visually appealing way. Make your gaming experience more immersive and streamlined with the robust functionalities of the Bibliosoph module.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH2Communications-Hint: These tools allows you to send richly formatted messages to your entire party. Using the powerful Markdown syntax, you can create and share messages with formatted text, lists, and more, making conversations more immersive and impactful.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubPartyMessageEnabled-Labe: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubPartyMessageEnabled-Hint: Show Party Message button in the Coffee Pub toolbar (default: true).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarFoundryPartyMessageEnabled-Hint: Show Party Message button in the Foundry toolbar (default: false).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3PartyMessage-Hint: Seamlessly send enriched, Markdown-enhanced messages to the entire gaming party.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.partyMessageMacro-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger messages to the party.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardThemePartyMessage-Hint: The color and aesthetics that should be used for public messages between party members.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubPrivateMessageEnabled-La: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubPrivateMessageEnabled-Hi: Show Private Message button in the Coffee Pub toolbar (default: true).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarFoundryPrivateMessageEnabled-Hint: Show Private Message button in the Foundry toolbar (default: false).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3PrivateMessage-Hint: Need to convey a secret message to a party member or have a confidential discussion with the GM? Take co-operative strategy making and role-playing to the next level with encoded whispers or hidden instructions to select individuals.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.privateMessageMacro-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the a private message betweeen party members.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardThemePrivateMessage-Hint: The color and aesthetics that should be used for the party message card.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardLayoutPrivateMessage-Hint: Show only portraits instead of full player details.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.beverageEnabled-Hint: Enable the Beverage Break messaging functionality.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubBeverageEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubBeverageEnabled-Hint: Show Beverage Break button in the Coffee Pub toolbar (default: true).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarFoundryBeverageEnabled-Hint: Show Beverage Break button in the Foundry toolbar (default: false).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3Beverage-Hint: Lets players conveniently communicate their brief absence for refreshment breaks because hydration is important. So are martinis.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardThemeBeverage-Hint: The color and aesthetics that should be used for the Beverage Break card.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.beverageTable-Hint: The name of the roll table to use for the Beverage Break cards.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.beverageMacro-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the Beverage Break cards.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.bioEnabled-Hint: Enable the Bio Break messaging functionality.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubBioEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubBioEnabled-Hint: Show Bio Break button in the Coffee Pub toolbar (default: true).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarFoundryBioEnabled-Hint: Show Bio Break button in the Foundry toolbar (default: false).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3Bio-Hint: Allows players to subtly indicate that they need a short break for personal needs, such as using the bathroom.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardThemeBio-Hint: The color and aesthetics that should be used for the Bio Break card.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.bioTable-Hint: The name of the roll table to use for the Bio Break cards.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.bioMacro-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the Bio Break cards.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubInsultsEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubInsultsEnabled-Hint: Show Insults button in the Coffee Pub toolbar (default: true).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarFoundryInsultsEnabled-Hint: Show Insults button in the Foundry toolbar (default: false).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3Insults-Hint: Looking to add a light-hearted touch to your game? This unique feature injects humor and unexpected bursts of venom into gameplay.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardThemeInsults-Hint: The color and aesthetics that should be used for the insults card.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.insultsTable-Hint: The name of the roll table to use for the insults.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.insultsMacro-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the insults.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubPraiseEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubPraiseEnabled-Hint: Show Praise button in the Coffee Pub toolbar (default: true).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarFoundryPraiseEnabled-Hint: Show Praise button in the Foundry toolbar (default: false).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3Praise-Hint: Use priase to spontaneously commend players for their brilliant tactics, role-playing skills, or simply spread good vibes around your virtual table.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardThemePraise-Hint: The color and aesthetics that should be used for the praise card.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.praiseTable-Hint: The name of the roll table to use for the praise.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.praiseMacro-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the praise.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH2RollTables-Hint: This is the description of the section.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubInvestigationEnabled-Lab: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubInvestigationEnabled-Hin: Show Investigation button in the Coffee Pub toolbar (default: true).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarFoundryInvestigationEnabled-Hint: Show Investigation button in the Foundry toolbar (default: false).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3Investigation-Hint: Dive deeper into your adventures with this tool allowing your party to roll from investigation tables, delivering richly formatted result cards to add depth and interactivity to your game.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardThemeInvestigation-Hint: The color and aesthetics that should be used for the investigation card.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationOdds-Hint: Odds of finding something during am investigation. Default: 20%.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationDice-Hint: Max numer of items to find if the party finds something. Default: 3.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationTable-Hint: The name of the roll table to use for the investigations.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.investigationMacro-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the investigation roll.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubGiftEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubGiftEnabled-Hint: Show Random Gifts button in the Coffee Pub toolbar (default: true).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarFoundryGiftEnabled-Hint: Show Random Gifts button in the Foundry toolbar (default: false).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3Gifts-Hint: Have a party member celbrating something in the campaign or real life? Let them roll for a gift.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.giftTable-Hint: The name of the roll table to use for the gifts.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.giftMacro-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the gift roll.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubShadygoodsEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubShadygoodsEnabled-Hint: Show Shady Goods button in the Coffee Pub toolbar (default: true).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarFoundryShadygoodsEnabled-Hint: Show Shady Goods button in the Foundry toolbar (default: false).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3ShadyGoods-Hint: Let your party experience the thrill of uncertainty with rolls from the Shady Goods table, where every roll uncovers a range of obscure, rare, and potentially illicit items, adding a layer of unpredictability to their adventure.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.shadygoodsTable-Hint: The name of the roll table to use for the shady goods.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.shadygoodsMacro-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the shady goods roll.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubCriticalEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubCriticalEnabled-Hint: Show Critical Hits button in the Coffee Pub toolbar (default: true).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarFoundryCriticalEnabled-Hint: Show Critical Hits button in the Foundry toolbar (default: false).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3Critical-Hint: Heighten the battle excitement with the Critical Hits rolls where each roll translates to a significant blow, turning the tide of the fight unexpectedly and adding an intense, dramatic twist to your combat scenarios.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardThemeCritical-Hint: The color and aesthetics that should be used for the critical card.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.criticalTable-Hint: The name of the roll table to use for the critical.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.criticalMacro-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the critical.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubFumbleEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubFumbleEnabled-Hint: Show Fumbles button in the Coffee Pub toolbar (default: true).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarFoundryFumbleEnabled-Hint: Show Fumbles button in the Foundry toolbar (default: false).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3Fumbles-Hint: Introduce a dose of chaos to your battles with Fumble Rolls, a feature that adds miscalculations and mishaps to the combat, making every encounter unpredictable and thrilling.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardThemeFumble-Hint: The color and aesthetics that should be used for the fumble card.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.fumbleTable-Hint: The name of the roll table to use for the fumble.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.fumbleMacro-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the fumble.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubInspirationEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubInspirationEnabled-Hint: Show Inspiration button in the Coffee Pub toolbar (default: true).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarFoundryInspirationEnabled-Hint: Show Inspiration button in the Foundry toolbar (default: false).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3Inspiration-Hint: Foster moments of sudden insight and creativity, adding unexpected tactical twists and novel strategies to your gaming experience.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardThemeInspiration-Hint: The color and aesthetics that should be used for the inspiration card.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.inspirationTable-Hint: The name of the roll table to use for the inspiration.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.inspirationMacro-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the inspiration.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.domtEnabled-Hint: Enable Deck of Many Things rolls.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3DOMT-Hint: Delve into the realm of fate and chance with Deck of Many Things Rolls, where each roll can bring fortune or disaster, instantly altering the course of your adventure and providing thrilling, game-changing moments.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardThemeDOMT-Hint: The color and aesthetics that should be used for the Deck of Many Things card.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.domtTable-Hint: The name of the roll table to use for the Deck of Many Things.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.domtMacro-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the Deck of Many Things.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH2Encounters-Hint: Fate dictates the turn of events as each roll can spontaneously spark a fresh challenge, encounter, or opportunity, making your gaming journey truly one-of-a-kind and full of surprises.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3EncounterSettings-Hint: Tailor the encounter odds to your liking, select the card style that suits your visual preference, and set the number of monsters your characters will face. This feature puts power in your hands, allowing you to fine-tune the difficulty and aesthetic of your game for an optimal experience. Coming soon is leveraging AI and right-sizing to the CR of the party.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardThemeEncounter-Hint: The color and aesthetics that should be used for the encounter card.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterOdds-Hint: Odds of an encoutnering a monster. Default: 20%.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterDice-Hint: Max number of monsters the party might encounter. Default: 5.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterTableNoEncounter-Hint: Select the table with the narration that should be displayed when there is no encounter.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterTableBefore-Hint: Select the table with the introduction to the encounter. And example of the text would be 'The quiet around you is suddenly broken.'
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterTableReveal-Hint: Select the table with the reveal of the monster. The monster name will be appended to this text. And example of the text would be 'come into view.' After the monster is appended it would read, '2 golbins come into view.'
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterTableAfter-Hint: Select the table with the narration that comes after the monster is revealed. An example of the text would be 'Your gut twists with the intuition of the threat.'
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3simpleGeneralEncounters-Hint: This is the description of the section.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterEnabledGeneral-Hint: Make General Encounters available as a random encounter type.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterTableGeneral-Hint: The name of the table to be used to roll random encounters for a generaic environment. Use this if you don't plan to add the specific roll bables below.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterMacroGeneral-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the encounter roll.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterEnabledCave-Hint: Make Cave Encounters available as a random encounter type.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3simpleCaveEncounters-Hint: Roll encounters from the cave encounter table.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterTableCave-Hint: The name of the table to be used to roll random encounters for this environemnt.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterMacroCave-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the encounter roll.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterEnabledDesert-Hint: Make Desert Encounters available as a random encounter type.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3simpleDesertEncounters-Hint: Roll encounters from the desert encounter table..
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterTableDesert-Hint: The name of the table to be used to roll random encounters for this environemnt.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterMacroDesert-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the encounter roll.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterEnabledDungeon-Hint: Make Dungeon Encounters available as a random encounter type.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3simpleDungeonEncounters-Hint: Roll encounters from the dungeon encounter table.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterTableDungeon-Hint: The name of the table to be used to roll random encounters for this environemnt.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterMacroDungeon-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the encounter roll.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterEnabledForest-Hint: Make Forest Encounters available as a random encounter type.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3simpleForestEncounters-Hint: Roll encounters from the forest encounter table.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterTableForest-Hint: The name of the table to be used to roll random encounters for this environemnt.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterMacroForest-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the encounter roll.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterEnabledMountain-Hint: Make Mountain Encounters available as a random encounter type.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3simpleMountainEncounters-Hint: Roll encounters from the mountain encounter table.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterTableMountain-Hint: The name of the table to be used to roll random encounters for this environemnt.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterMacroMountain-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the encounter roll.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterEnabledSky-Hint: Make Sky Encounters available as a random encounter type.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3simpleSkyEncounters-Hint: Roll encounters from the sky encounter table.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterTableSky-Hint: The name of the table to be used to roll random encounters for this environemnt.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterMacroSky-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the encounter roll.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterEnabledSnow-Hint: Make Snow Encounters available as a random encounter type.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3simpleSnowEncounters-Hint: Roll encounters from the snow encounter table.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterTableSnow-Hint: The name of the table to be used to roll random encounters for this environemnt.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterMacroSnow-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the encounter roll.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterEnabledUrban-Hint: Make Urban Encounters available as a random encounter type.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3simpleUrbanEncounters-Hint: Roll encounters from the urban encounter table.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterTableUrban-Hint: The name of the table to be used to roll random encounters for this environemnt.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterMacroUrban-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the encounter roll.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterEnabledWater-Hint: Make Water Encounters available as a random encounter type.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3simpleWaterEncounters-Hint: Roll encounters from the water encounter table.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterTableWater-Hint: The name of the table to be used to roll random encounters for this environemnt.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.encounterMacroWater-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the encounter roll.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH2Injuries-Hint: Injuries alter the course of actions as each impact can unexpectedly ignite a new wound, trauma, or recovery chance, making your gaming journey uniquely fraught with peril and unpredictability.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3InjuriesSettings-Hint: Adjust the injury possibilities to fit your narrative, choose the graphical representation that best matches your storytelling style, and determine the severity of wounds your characters can sustain. This module empowers you to customize the level of risk and visual aspects of your game for an immersive experience.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.injuriesEnabledGlobal-Hint: Make injuries available as an additional bonus on big attacks.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubInjuriesEnabled-Label: Show in the Coffee Pub toolbar
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarCoffeePubInjuriesEnabled-Hint: Show Injuries button in the Coffee Pub toolbar (default: true).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.toolbarFoundryInjuriesEnabled-Hint: Show Injuries button in the Foundry toolbar (default: false).
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.injuryCompendium-Hint: The name of the compendium for injuries. Hint: It has to be a journal compendium.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.cardThemeInjury-Hint: The color and aesthetics that should be used for the injury card.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.injuryImageEnabled-Hint: Display the large image that goest with the injury. Default: Enable (checked)
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.injurySound-Hint: The sound to be played when and injury occurs. Default: none.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.injurySoundVolume-Hint: Set how loud you want the injury sound to be when played. Default: 0.07.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.headingH3simpleInjuriesGlobal-Hint: Adjust the injury possibilities to fit your narrative, choose the graphical representation that best matches your storytelling style, and determine the severity of wounds your characters can sustain. This module empowers you to customize the level of risk and visual aspects of your game for an immersive experience.
coffee-pub-bibliosoph.injuriesMacroGlobal-Hint: The name of the macro that should trigger the Global injury roll. This will grab a random injury from any category.
